column4: duno if anybody that tried to help before is still around but,i think ubuntu gives root a random password, so to set up sudo to need it, i needed to set it via administration>users then add rootpw to sudoers
hmm well i must of set 1  by mistake at some point or something
when you first install ubuntu you add a user and give that user a password, it's that password you use with sudo to do admin operations
root does not have a password unless you give it one
